General.Name: SMS Pharmaceuticals Limited
General.Description: SMS Pharmaceuticals Limited manufactures and sells active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) and intermediates in India. The company offers anti-ulcer, anti-fungal, anti-migraine, anti-diabetic, erectile dysfunction, antiemetic, antiepileptic, antipsychotic, anti-hypertensive, anti-anginal, anti-viral, urinary antispasmodic, and anti-retroviral APIs. It is also involved in the contract research activities. The company also exports its products. SMS Pharmaceuticals Limited was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
